info.title: Notion API - Public Beta
info.description:
Hello and welcome!

To make use of the Public Beta collection as it's written, please duplicate [this database template](https://www.notion.so/8e2c2b769e1d47d287b9ed3035d607ae?v=dc1b92875fb94f10834ba8d36549bd2a).

[Create an integration](notion.so/my-integrations) to retrieve an API token, add your database and page ID's as variables in the collection, and start making your requests!  

For our full documentation, including sample integrations and guides, visit [developers.notion.com](developers.notion.com)

Need more help? Join our [developer community on Slack](https://join.slack.com/t/notiondevs/shared_invite/zt-lkrnk74h-YmPRroySRFGiqgjI193AqA/)

get.description: Retrieves a Page object using the ID in the request path. This endpoint exposes page properties, not page content.

patch.description: Updates a page by setting the values of any properties specified in the JSON body of the request. Properties not updated via parameters will remain unchanged.

text.content: Some think chief ethics officers could help technology companies navigate political and social questions.

text.plain_text: Some think chief ethics officers could help technology companies navigate political and social questions.

get.description: Retrieves a database object using the ID specified in the request path.
Returns a paginated list of user objects for a workspace

text.content: Lacinato kale is a variety of kale with a long tradition in Italian cuisine, especially that of Tuscany. It is also known as Tuscan kale, Italian kale, dinosaur kale, kale, flat back kale, palm tree kale, or black Tuscan palm.

get.description: Retrieve a user object using the ID specified in the request path.
